author: jpeg68
title: A similar set exists.
review: This is almost identical to the World player (numbered 3, instead of 4, in top right corner) that came with the Limited edition, (unnumbered!)Merlin sponsored, England starter set. I have the set, but have Scotland stickers instead of England ones! I would have to make the World players Scotland and the England players the World.

author: lego_man_123456
title: fun minifigure!
review:
this set is may look small but really there's more to this set than you think like you get a classic minifigure.

pros
- minifigure

cons
- none

this is a good small set fun to play with perfect to add to almost any lego collection get this set!

author: Flash88
title: Squad building
review: The most simplest of sets! Remember unwrapping each individual pack with great excitement, ready to play with the team on my new pitch! Ended up using the World team branding, don't think I had the Scotland stickers.

author: Lego_fan_
title: Nice little Blue Minifigure
review: This is a nice little Minifigure. I am not really into sports sets but my cousin was getting rid of it and so I took it in and gave it some TLC. It is great for playing and displaying with city and Modular buildings sets.
